expo.name: NayaVed AI

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: NayaVed AI uses your camera for tongue diagnosis and pulse analysis to provide personalized Ayurvedic health insights.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: NayaVed AI needs access to your photo library to save and analyze diagnostic images.

expo.description: Ancient Ayurveda wisdom powered by AI. Your personal health guide based on 5,000 years of Charaka Samhita teachings.
